ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: It sounds like either you need to zone to have your languages update, or he is teaching you some other language and should really change the wording on his
ygData.messageBody:
It sounds like either you need to zone to have your languages update, or he
is teaching you some other language and should really change the wording on
his macro.

-Dan Alexander

At 07:29 PM 05/24/1999 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>
>
>I have a friend who is teaching me Elvish. He spams me with a macro, "you
>are learning the Elvish tongue", and I occasionally get a message saying my
>language skill is improving. But then I noticed that the only language I
>have a skill for, besides common, is Erudian, which is at awful level. Does
>anyone know if you can learn the other languages if they are not listed in
>your skills? Thanks.
